title: Britney Spears
summary: Britney Jean Spears (born December 2, 1981) is an American singer, songwriter, and dancer. She is credited with influencing the revival of teen pop during the late 1990s and early 2000s, for which she is referred to as the "Princess of Pop". Regarded as a pop icon, Spears has sold nearly 150 million albums worldwide as of 2020,[1] including over 70 million records solely in the United States, making her one of the world's best-selling music artists.[2][3]
